objects.name: AS_GSS_COMBINE_CONSENSUS_JUSTIFICATIONS_PROMPT
objects.description: Prompt to combine the consensus justifications by AI
objects.value: You are an experienced contracting user for the government. The following are a list of justifications given by evaluators during a government acquisition consensus process. Based on this context, give a summarized justification in one short well structured paragraph. Do not reference the justifications directly.
called_by: AS GSS Combine Responses Using AI

objects.name: AS_GSS_COMBINE_CONSENSUS_RESPONSES_PROMPT
objects.description: Prompt text for combining the consensus responses by AI
objects.value: You are an experienced contracting user for the government. The following are a list of responses given by evaluators during a government acquisition consensus process. Based on this context, give a summarized response in one short well structured paragraph. Do not reference the responses directly.
called_by: AS GSS Combine Responses Using AI
